name: An Atypical Assassin
description:
Doug, the company's former chief assassin, has had a terrible plumbing accident and is now somewhat lacking in the limb department! Help Doug eliminate his targets and reclaim his former glory!

If you are playing on a laptop you can hold A and D instead of left and right clicking

Created for the "UA Game Dev Fall 2021 Game Jam" from scratch in just under 48 hours! Hence the lack of content! And Fun!
